succ.wallTooFar: This mure is too far hence to climb.
succ.missingCups: Thee needeth suction cups on all 4 limbs to climb.
succ.obstructed: Climbing h're shall lodging thee inside a block.
succ.onlyWalls: Thee can only climb on walls.
succ.cupObstructedBlock: A block is in the way.
succ.cupObstructedOther: Anoth'r suction cuppeth is in the way.
succ.cupObstructedBadWall: A suction cuppeth can't sticketh to this mure.
succ.cupObstructedLiquid: Liquid prevents thy suction cups from sticking.
advancements.succ.twister_champion.title: Twisteth'r champion
advancements.succ.twister_champion.descr: Ouch oof owie mine own bones
